node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `message` ( `message_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `msgtext` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `author_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tstamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `for_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `room` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `archive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `for_usergroup` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`), KEY `room` (`room`), KEY `for_usergroup_index` (`for_usergroup`), KEY `tstamp_index` (`tstamp`), KEY `foruser_archive_messageid` (`for_user`,`archive`,`message_id`), KEY `homenode_messages` (`for_user`,`author_user`), KEY `foruser_tstamp` (`for_user`,`tstamp`), KEY `foruser_archive_tstamp` (`for_user`,`archive`,`tstamp`), KEY `for_user_author_user_archive_tstamp` (`for_user`,`author_user`,`archive`,`tstamp`), KEY `for_user_for_usergroup` (`for_user`,`for_usergroup`), KEY `foruser_tstamp_message_id` (`for_user`,`tstamp`,`message_id`), KEY `message_author` (`author_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: message
